title: Avatars Abound!.rar
description:
This file contains literally thousands of 'Avatar' pictures. I compiled it myself over a few months of intensive searching/downloading. The avatars cover a very wide range of subjects & themes; everything from the dark & macabre, to the light-hearted & amusing, popular cartoons/actors/symbols, etc. Most are at or under the standard avatar dimensions (100 x 100) but many exceed it as well since some more modern sites will allow much larger avatars, thus allowing for greater detail.

Hopefully this holds at least some interest to a few of you out there; I know when I first went looking for avatars that fit me personally I would've LOVED something like this!

P.S. This is my first attempt at creating my own torrent, so wish me luck!


UPDATE: To find all my downloads easily simply search for kryntaal
        I'm including my username as a tag on all my torrents.
